annotations.title: Klingon Bloodwine from Star Trek | How to Drink

textContent:
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Simple Syurp
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Lime Juice
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Lemonhart 151 rum
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Angostura Bitters

Shake and strain into a science fiction glass or a martini glass
Qapla'!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4u-zkNVuy70
title: Klingon Bloodwine
